keyword: how many calories in coors light beer
title: How Many Calories in Coors Light Beer?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Coors Light beer per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and comparisons to other light beers for smarter choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Coors Light Beer?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can, light lager, as served chilled from the bottle or can, no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects totals. Always check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Coors Light beer contains 102 calories, mostly from 5 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Coors Banquet (higher carb version)
Mix with diet soda (no added calories)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Coors Light beer?
What are the carbs in Coors Light beer?
faqs.a: Approximately 5 g of carbohydrates per serving, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 1 g protein and 0 g fat per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Around 10 mg per can, low compared to many beverages.

faqs.q: Is Coors Light lower calorie than regular beer?
faqs.a: Yes, at 102 kcal vs. 140+ in many regular lagers like Budweiser.
